document_data.name: Berinvar
document_data.mainbody: '''Berinvar''' was a [[fighter]] who served in the [[Athkatla]]n cell of the [[Harpers]] in the 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Berinvar and his allies were hunting down the [[necromancer]] [[Prebek]], who served under an agent of the [[Zhentarim]].
document_data.Relationships: Berinvar operated within the same Harper cell as [[Rylock]] and the nobleman [[Galvarey]]. They were headquartered at Galvarey's grand estate in Athkatla's docks.
